instructions_to_main_agent: 1. IMPLEMENTATION ORDER: Create DashboardLayout.js first, then Sidebar.js and Header.js.
2. SIDEBAR LOGIC: Use a context or prop for 'isCollapsed' state. Ensure text fades out smoothly when collapsing.
3. GLASS EFFECT: Apply the 'glassmorphism.sidebar' class string to the sidebar container. Do not use solid backgrounds.
4. ACTIVE STATE: Navigation items must have a distinct active state (emerald text + subtle bg gradient).
5. MOBILE: On mobile, hide the sidebar and show a 'Menu' button in the Header that opens a Sheet containing the Sidebar content.
6. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (sidebar-toggle, nav-item-*, logout-btn, etc.).
7. THEME: Ensure all colors use Tailwind CSS variables (bg-background, text-foreground) to support the existing dark mode toggle.
8. NO MOCKING: Use the provided image URLs. Do not use placeholder text for images.

universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure text contrast is > 4.5:1. Use aria-labels for icon-only buttons.
